title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; chat, generate, embed, list/pull models with a simple asyncio/sync API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, embed and chat wrappers for chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui (open-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly ollama-webui) with chat history, RAG, admin panel, and plugin system.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & async APIs, model management, and streaming chat.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST endpoints for chat, generate, embed, and model operations.

title: ollama-cli (rust)
summary: Fast Rust CLI for chatting with Ollama models, featuring conversation repl and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-chatbot (streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chatbot app demonstrating Ollama integration with session memory and model selector.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with NVIDIA GPU and Docker Compose ready.

title: ollama-rag (privateGPT variant)
summary: PrivateGPT fork replacing the backend with Ollama for fully local RAG ingestion and querying.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses in chat threads with slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-npm (unofficial)
summary: Lightweight community npm wrapper for Ollama REST endpoints with TypeScript definitions.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting chat, generation, embeddings, and streaming via System.Text.Json.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container and exposes functions for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rust-sdk
summary: Community Rust SDK providing strongly typed APIs for chat, generate, embed, and model management.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama models for scalable inference with autoscaling replicas.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.
